items.name: Data Collection
items.description: Initial phase for collecting data from various sources

items.name: Data Validation
items.description: Validate and clean collected data for quality assurance

items.name: Data Processing
items.description: Process and transform data according to business rules

items.name: Analysis
items.description: Analyze processed data to extract insights and patterns

items.name: Decision Making
items.description: Make business decisions based on analysis results

items.name: Action Execution
items.description: Execute actions based on decisions made

items.name: Monitoring
items.description: Monitor the results and performance of executed actions

items.name: Feedback Loop
items.description: Collect feedback and iterate on the workflow process
